file_insights.description: New comprehensive test suite for error handling and display

patterns_discovered: Systematic error testing across multiple scenarios
Error formatting with sorted context keys
Handling of different error types (Weaver errors vs standard errors)
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle nil errors gracefully
Importance of consistent color and formatting across different error types
Rendering of context, cause, and suggestions with proper spacing
Sorting of context keys for predictable output
recommendations: Continue expanding test coverage for edge cases
Maintain consistent error rendering across different scenarios
Implement robust handling for nil and standard errors
Consider adding more specific test cases for complex error scenarios
